thread.title: Fed's Fischer against limits to emergency lending
thread.title_full: Fed's Fischer against limits to emergency lending

author: cnbc.com
title: Fed's Fischer against limits to emergency lending
text:
Brendan McDermid | Reuters Stanley Fischer Federal Reserve Vice Chair Stanley Fischer said on Friday there should be no further limits put on the U.S. central bank's emergency lending powers. (Tweet This)
In response to a question following a speech to the U.S. Chamber of Commerce in Washington , Fischer said the Fed could work with the post-financial crisis restrictions on the types of companies it could lend to.
Warren grills Fed Chair Yellen
Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-Mass.) asks Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen about the living wills of big banks, and regulatory scrutiny on banks.
Read More Traders watch for whiff of inflation
But he said the process had gone as far as it should.
